ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-backup
ns0:entry.ns0:content: Terraform module to provision AWS Backup, a fully managed backup service that makes it easy to centralize and automate the back up of data across AWS services such as EBS volumes, RDS databases, DynamoDB tables, EFS file systems, and AWS Storage Gateway volumes.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-ecs-cluster
ns0:entry.ns0:content: Terraform module for provisioning an ECS cluster

ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-efs
ns0:entry.ns0:content: Terraform Module to define an EFS Filesystem (aka NFS)

ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-sso
ns0:entry.ns0:content: Terraform module to configure AWS Single Sign-On (SSO)

ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-vpc-peering
ns0:entry.ns0:content: Terraform module to create a peering connection between two VPCs in the same AWS account.
